name: Three CheeseTuna Steak
description: This delightful Three Cheese Tuna Steak recipe is a perfect blend of high-protein and low-carb ingredients, designed for those looking to enjoy a healthy yet flavorful meal. With a mix of mozzarella, Tillamook, and parmesan cheese, complemented by the rich taste of sashimi tuna and seasoned with fresh lemon juice and black pepper, this dish is a testament to healthy eating without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill or pan on medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the mozzarella, Tillamook, and parmesan cheese. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the sashimi tuna generously with ground black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Coat both sides of the tuna steak with virgin coconut oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Place the tuna steak on the grill or pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or adjust the time depending on your preferred level of doneness.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the last minute of cooking, evenly sprinkle the grated cheeses over the tuna steak, allowing them to melt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the tuna steak from the heat and let it rest for a couple of minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle fresh squeezed lemon juice over the top before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
